buyFAssetByAgentFactor.description: FTSO price factor at which the agent pays for burned fassets (in vault tokens) during pool providers' self close exit.

mintingPoolCollateralRatio.description: Agent's minting collateral ratio for pool collateral (minimum CR at which the minting can happen).

mintingVaultCollateralRatio.description: Agent's minting collateral ratio for vault collateral (minimum CR at which the minting can happen).

poolExitCollateralRatio.description:
Collateral pool's exit collateral ratio (minimum CR for pool collateral at which the collateral pool providers can exit;
however, self-close exit is allowed even at lower pool CR).

poolFeeShare.description: The percentage of the minting fee that goes to the collateral pool.

poolTokenSuffix.description:
Token suffix for the new collateral pool's token.
Must be unique within this fasset type.

poolTopupCollateralRatio.description: Pool collateral ratio below which the providers can enter at discounted rate.

poolTopupTokenPriceFactor.description: Discounted price factor at which providers can enter when topup is active (i.e. the pool CR is below poolTopupCollateralRatio).

vaultCollateralFtsoSymbol.description: The tokenFtsoSymbol symbol in the collateral type for the created agent vault vault vollateral.
